events.title: Community Garden Day
events.description: Join us for a day of gardening and community building!

events.title: Food Drive Volunteer
events.description: Help collect and distribute food to those in need.

events.title: Environmental Cleanup
events.description: Help clean up our local park and protect our environment.

events.title: Neighborhood Watch Meeting
events.description: Monthly meeting to discuss neighborhood safety and community initiatives.

events.title: Youth Mentorship Program
events.description: Volunteer to mentor local youth in academics and life skills.

events.title: Farmers Market Setup
events.description: Help local farmers set up their stalls for the weekly market.

events.title: Senior Center Visit
events.description: Spend time with seniors through activities and conversation.

events.title: Tech Workshop for Kids
events.description: Teach basic coding and technology skills to children aged 8-12.

events.title: Community Cleanup
events.description: Join the monthly community cleanup effort across town.

events.title: Homeless Shelter Meal Service
events.description: Prepare and serve meals to residents at the local homeless shelter.
